snippet.title: Chronomon - Monster Taming SIM Trailer
snippet.description:
Chronomon - Monster Taming simulations RPG 
What a mouth full. 
Catch, train and evolve monsters in this new cross platform #wearos #steam #PCgames #androidgames 

Care for your farm, forage to for items, cook, fish, sleep all in full day and night cycles. Find out what the town is doing at certain times, complete quests and find time exclusive items and monsters. 

Battle other monsters right on the map, gain levels, unlock new abilities and learn through multiple passive skill trees. 

Let your monsters loose on the farm. Care for them, pet them, feed them, play games and even choose to put them in special events against other towns and peoples monsters. 

#chronomon is a feature heavy spin on the classics like #pokemon or #coromon that work you can play on your smartwatch, PC and mobile devices. 

#kickstarter pre-registration is live now! 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/chronomon/chronomon-monster-taming-jrpg-for-wearos-smartwatches

Find other smartwatch games by Stone Golem Studios 
https://www.stonegolemstudio.com/

Join us in discussion on Discord
https://discord.gg/ACnMhFJkvm

Music by the wonderful DOGMATICAL
https://www.fiverr.com/dogmatical
https://www.youtube.com/@AkiseDOGMA
